name: CMAT 2021
description: CMAT (Common Management Admission Test) is a national level entrance examination conducted by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) every year as per the directions of Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD), Government of India. The CMAT is a three hour computer based test which is conducted in a single session. This test facilitates Institutes to select Graduate candidates for admission in all suitable Management Programs. The CMAT Score is accepted by all AICTE-Approved Institutions/University/Departments/Constituent Colleges/Affiliated Colleges.  CMAT syllabus is split into the following sections:  ** Language Comprehension - Questions on reading comprehension, sectence correction, sentence completion, synonyms, antonyms etc.  ** Quantitative Techniques & Data Interpretation - Questions from Number Systems, HCF, LCM, profit loss, percentages and discounts, ages,Tables, Bar, Pie Charts, Venn Diagram etc. Logical Reasoning - Questions on Analogies, Similarities, Decision Making, Problem-Solving, Series, Arithmetical  Reasoning etc.  ** General Awareness - Current Affairs  National & International, History  India & World, Indian Economy, Indian Geography, Indian Constitution, Indian Culture & Heritage, Indian Polity.   Key Features of CMAT android app by Eduwhere  1. Complete Mock Test which covers all sections 2. Subject wise practice tests 3. Reports to reflect accuracy and speed. 4. Tips & tricks for CMAT on www.eduwhere.in/knowledge-hub  You can also check subject wise ability for # Language Comprehension for CMAT 2019 # Quantitative Techniques & Data Interpretation for CMAT 2019 # Genral Awareness for CMAT 2019  We also help you analyze your subject wise performance with each mock test.
